price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߡߴߊߟߊ߫ ߓߏ߲߬ߧߴߊ߬ ߓߏ߲߬ߧߊ߬ߢߊ ߕߌ߯ߕߌ߮ ߞߊ߲߬ ، ߊߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߝߊ߲߬ߞߊ߬ߡߊ߫ ߣߌ߬ߣߌ߬ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: مَا قَدَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدۡرِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: mā qadarū al-laha ḥaqqa qadrihi inna al-laha laqawiyyun ʿazīzun
